- Chi ha chiuso queste porte? - Non noi.

translation.en: Something is closing it from outside.
Open the door. Open the door.

translation.en: Is there a doctor in the house?
-Put some pressure on that wound. -Give me that rag.
translation.it: - Faccia pressione su quella ferita. - Mi dia quello straccio.

translation.en: Why are they locking if there's a fire?

translation.en: There's no fire, Wanda. There is no fire.
translation.it: Non c'è nessun incendio, Wanda. Non c'è nessun incendio.

translation.en: We have an officer down. We have an officer down.
translation.it: Un agente è stato ferito. Un agente è stato ferito.

translation.en: I need an ambulance immediately. I need backup.
translation.it: Ci serve subito un'ambulanza. Ci servono rinforzi.

translation.en: I have a fucking hurt officer here.
translation.it: Un agente è stato ferito, cazzo.

translation.en: What's going on? Hey, what's happening?
translation.it: Cosa succede? Ehi, cosa sta succedendo?

translation.en: I know no more than you do right now.

translation.en: My partner's on the floor bleeding.

translation.en: We are working hard to get you out of the building.

translation.en: Please follow the officers' instructions. This will all be over shortly.

translation.en: -What will all be over? -What's going on?
Why are we locked in our building?
Be calm. That's what that means.
Please remain calm and everything's-- Get the camera out of here.
translation.it: Per favore rimanete calmi e tutto-- Metti via quella cinepresa.

translation.en: Don't touch the camera. We have every right to shoot.

translation.en: -I'm tired of the camera. -People need to see what's going on.
translation.it: - Sono stufo della cinepresa. - La gente deve vedere cosa succede.

translation.en: I'm in charge here. Turn it off--
If you were, you'd be worried about getting your partner out.
translation.it: Se fossi in lei, mi preoccuperei di portare fuori il suo compagno.
Non se stiamo girando o no.

translation.en: You are two steps from being arrested, okay?

translation.en: This man will bleed to death.
Everybody stop fighting, okay? Stop fighting.
translation.it: Smettete di litigare, okay? Smettete di litigare.

translation.en: We need to get this man out of here.

translation.en: -What's behind that door? -That's a fabric workshop.
translation.it: - Cosa c'è dietro quella porta. - È il laboratorio di tessuti.

translation.en: -Is there a way out from there? -Yeah, through the back. Come, come.
translation.it: - C'è un'uscita da lì? - Sì, dal retro. Venite, venite.

translation.en: You're not helping the situation. Okay?

translation.en: My husband's outside. Said there are cops.

translation.en: Blocked off the street. He was getting antibiotics.
translation.it: Hanno bloccato la strada. Era andato a prendere gli antibiotici.
- Oh, Gesù, Fletch. - Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: -Don't move him. -No, we have to, we have to.

translation.it: - Non muoverlo. - Sì, sì, sì, okay.

translation.en: All right, he's still got a pulse.
Get the vet over here. Get the vet now.

translation.en: He's still got a pulse. Take care of him.

translation.en: All right. Come with me, let's go.
Come on, come on. You two stay here, all right?

translation.en: Keep an eye on my partner, please.

translation.en: The sound's coming from in there.
What are you two doing here? Get the camera back.

translation.en: We need to get you guys out of here.
Ma'am, listen to me. Can you hear me, Miss Espinoza?

translation.en: I need you to stay right where you are, okay?
All right? We wanna help you here.
Put your hands in the air for me, Mrs. Espinoza.
Okay? Put your hands in the air.
Put the gun down. Let's go.
-You saw that, right? -Yeah, I saw it.

translation.en: Let's just get downstairs. Let's get downstairs.
-Look, don't worry. I got it. -I said show it to me!
translation.it: - Non preoccuparti. L'ho ripreso. - Fammelo vedere!

translation.en: -What the hell was that? -I don't know. I think--
translation.it: - Cosa diavolo era? - Non lo so. Credo--

translation.en: We should probably just get down the stairs, okay?
I know, I know, I know.
-Oh, my God. -We just have to get downstairs.
I need you to open up the door.
Fire department. We need everyone to gather downstairs in the atrium.
translation.it: Vigili del fuoco. Dovete tutti riunirvi di sotto nell'atrio.

translation.en: Yes, we need you to go downstairs.
-Was there a fire? -No, it's just a precaution.

translation.en: Look, we just need you to get downstairs.
Does this have anything to do with the cable being out?

translation.en: -Come on, let's go. -What? Wait, wait, wait.
translation.it: - Forza, andiamo. - Cosa? Aspetti, aspetti, aspetti.

translation.en: -What if I don't wanna go? -Then I'd be forced to force you.
translation.it: - E se non volessi andare? - Allora sarei forzato a forzarla.

translation.en: Hi. I'm with the fire department.
translation.it: Salve. Sono coi vigili del fuoco.

translation.en: We need everyone to gather in the atrium.
Okay, we need everybody downstairs, so....
All right, there's people down there, and we need you two to go there.

translation.en: Ma'am, I'm with the fire department.

translation.en: We need you to quickly and calmly walk down to the lobby, please.

translation.en: Ma'am, we need you to get downstairs, okay?

translation.en: -I don't know that that's a good idea. -She needs help.
translation.it: - Non so se sia una buona idea. - Ha bisogno d'aiuto.

translation.en: We're just taking you downstairs, okay, ma'am?
translation.it: La portiamo di sotto, okay, signora?

translation.en: Holy shit. Did you see that?
That rat just totally came after me. Hey, did you see that?
translation.it: Quel topo mi ha attaccato. Ehi, hai visto?

translation.en: -Oh, my God, look at Elise. -Somebody grab that chair.
translation.it: - Oh, mio Dio, guardate Elise. - Qualcuno prenda quella sedia.

translation.en: -What's wrong with her? -Set her down, set her down.
Can't stop the bleeding. Get him to a hospital. He's gonna die.
translation.it: Non riesco a fermare l'emorragia. Portatelo in ospedale. Morirà.

translation.en: Stay here. I'm gonna check the exit.
translation.it: Resti qui. Vado a controllare l'uscita.

translation.en: No, no, wait. We are under strict orders--
translation.it: No, no, aspetta. Ci hanno ordinato--

translation.en: We're under orders to stay in the hall. Help me.
translation.it: Ci hanno ordinato di restare nell'atrio. Aiutami.

translation.en: Fuck your orders, all right? My friend's dying!
translation.it: Vaffanculo gli ordini, d'accordo? Il mio amico sta morendo!

translation.en: -Didn't catch that. You're breaking up. -Two people have died.
translation.it: - Non sento. È caduta la linea. - Due persone sono morte.

translation.en: Two others are in need of medical care. Police have blocked off the exit.
translation.it: Altre due necessitano cure mediche. La polizia ha bloccato l'uscita.

translation.en: They've given us no explanation. We're trying to find a way out.
translation.it: Non ci hanno dato spiegazioni. Stiamo cercando una via d'uscita.
- State lontano dalla finestra. - Via, via.

translation.en: You need to remain in the building.
Attention, please. Do not try to leave the building.
translation.it: Attenzione, per favore. Non cercate di lasciare l'edificio.

translation.en: All exits have been sealed. Just stay calm.

translation.en: We will send someone in there shortly to assess the situation.

translation.en: What are we supposed to do?
-What are we supposed to do? -Just wait.

translation.en: No, you're not getting my question.
translation.it: No, non capisci la mia domanda.

translation.en: I'm asking why they're calling this a BNC.

- Cos'è una BNC? - Non lo so.

- Cos'è una BNC? - Chi ha parlato di--?

translation.en: What's a BNC? What is it?
A biological, nuclear or chemical threat.
translation.it: Una minaccia biologica, nucleare o chimica.

translation.en: -It's more common than you think. -Supposed to be reassuring?

translation.en: Our cell phones don't work. Neither do the TVs or our radios.

translation.en: -Why are they isolating us? -I don't know.

translation.en: You can't keep us trapped here.
We are all trapped in here. Step over here.

- Venga qua, per favore. - Jake, Jake.

translation.en: There might be-- From the office on the second floor, there is an overhang.

translation.en: Maybe we can use to jump down to the patio.

translation.en: I don't want anyone knowing we're in here.

translation.en: --go to the right side and jump.
It's only two and a half meters.

translation.en: Can you see me? Can you see me?
-What are you doing? -We have a film crew in here.

translation.en: Tell your boss we have a TV crew in here.

translation.en: We are filming this. Please, wait.
People are gonna see what you're doing to us.

translation.en: -Why can't we go out? -People are gonna see this.

translation.en: What are you doing in here?
-You knew about this, didn't you? -Knew what?

translation.en: That they're sealing us in here.

translation.en: I don't know anything and don't you fucking put your hands on me again.

Metti via quella cazzo di cinepresa.
- Non toccarmi. - Non toccare quella cinepresa.

translation.en: We need to show people what's going on here.

translation.en: -Only proof we have. -Don't you get it?

translation.en: You're locked in here like us. You think they give a shit about you?

translation.en: -Let's all just calm down, all right? -Shut up.
This thing is getting to all of us.

translation.en: No one here is gonna hurt you, okay?

translation.en: We're trying to get out. That's all we're trying to do.

translation.en: I was just freaked out. Let's go.
Grab his legs, okay? Come on, let's go.

translation.en: What we'll do is we'll roll him on his side.

translation.en: We just have to be really careful.

translation.it: - Che ore sono? - L'una e trentasette.

translation.en: It's 1:37 in the morning, and everyone is scared.

translation.en: They've given us no information, cut off communication...

translation.en: ...from walkie-talkies and cell phones to the building's cable and Internet.
translation.it: ...da walkie-talkie e cellulari alla TV via cavo e Internet.

translation.en: The people trapped here, myself included...
translation.it: La gente intrappolata qui, me inclusa...

translation.en: Listen, I've got a ton of Vicodin in my apartment, if that will help.

translation.en: I'll just-- I'll grab a bunch of stuff.

translation.en: I basically got a pharmacy up there.
You can't arrest me for that, because of self-incrimination--

translation.en: Sir, you are the least of my worries right now, okay?

translation.en: Do what you're gonna do, please.

translation.en: You ever seen anything like this before?

translation.en: No, I've never seen anything like this.
translation.it: No, non ho mai visto niente del genere.

translation.en: I don't usually treat people. Dogs and cats, mostly.

translation.en: All I can really do is I can dress their wounds and try to comfort them.

translation.en: How are the injured men doing?
They both lost a lot of blood, and the fireman over here...

translation.en: ...he's got a bunch of broken bones and probable internal bleeding.
translation.it: ...ha delle ossa rotte e probabilmente un'emorragia interna.

translation.en: Apparently, Mrs. Espinoza attacked and bit them in some kind of a fit.

translation.en: But honestly, I find that a little hard to believe...

translation.en: ...that an old lady could do something like this to two grown men.
translation.it: ...che una vecchietta possa fare qualcosa del genere a due adulti.

translation.en: Briana, that's a very pretty name. How old are you, Briana?

translation.en: With my mom and my dad and my dog, Max.

translation.en: Max. I haven't met Max. Where is he?

translation.en: My dad took him to the vet because he's sick.

- Sembri un po' malata anche tu. - Sì.

translation.en: -She's had it for weeks, it's not like-- -You know what?
translation.it: - È così da molte settimane, non è-- - Mi scusi.

translation.en: If you don't mind, I'd like to keep you quiet while I interview Briana.

translation.en: It confuses the audience when people talk from off-camera.

translation.en: -Oh, God, I'm sorry. -No, no, it's okay.
translation.it: - Oh, Dio, mi dispiace. - No, no, non si preoccupi.
- La intervisterò dopo. - No, non importa.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't like being sick either.

translation.en: Briana, you're a very brave girl...

translation.en: ...and I'm really happy we got a chance to meet.

translation.en: She's been fearless since she was little.
Why don't you just start by introducing yourselves?
Well, I'm Ber-- I'm Bernard. This is my roommate, Sadie.
translation.it: Beh, sono Ber-- Mi chiamo Bernard. Questa è la mia coinquilina, Sadie.

translation.en: And how long have you lived in the building?

translation.en: I've been here two and a half years.

translation.en: And what do you do for a living?
Sadie's my best student, my protégé.

translation.en: Where the hell is the doctor?
I got him, got him, got him.

translation.en: Hold him, hold him. Hold his neck, hold his neck.

translation.en: Oh, my God, is he still alive?

translation.en: Hold him still, hold him still. He's gonna go down.
No, no, stay here, stay here. No, the dog will come back.

translation.en: -Okay, I have to show you something. -What?
translation.it: - Okay, devo farti vedere una cosa. - Cosa?

translation.en: Have to show you something. Just a sec.

translation.en: I think I know what this is.
translation.it: Credo di sapere di cosa si tratti.
- Vieni, vieni a vedere. Guarda. - Oh, Dio.

translation.en: Her tear ducts and salivary glands are constantly flowing.
translation.it: I dotti lacrimali e le ghiandole salivari secernano in continuazione.

translation.en: She seems to be unable to swallow or speak.
translation.it: Pare che non riesca a inghiottire o a parlare.

translation.en: She has a fever, she's confused.
She has some degree of paralysis and delirium.

translation.en: Never seen it in humans, but I know what rabies look like.
translation.it: Non l'ho mai vista nelle persone ma so come si manifesta.

translation.en: Are you trying to tell me these people have rabies?

translation.en: Tears, saliva, fever. They have what she has.
translation.it: Lacrime, saliva, febbre. Hanno quello che ha lei.

translation.en: But here's the thing. Rabies takes months for symptoms to show.
translation.it: Ma c'è un problema. La rabbia ci mette mesi a manifestare sintomi.

translation.en: This is taking minutes. I mean, rabies never acts this fast.
translation.it: Questa ci sta mettendo minuti. Non succede mai così velocemente.

translation.en: How does rabies spread? Through bites?
translation.it: Come si contrae la rabbia? Attraverso morsi?

translation.en: No, it's passed through anything wet. Blood, saliva, any mucous membrane.
translation.it: No, attraverso qualsiasi cosa umida. Sangue, saliva, qualsiasi mucosa.

translation.en: So if you get their blood on you, you're okay.
translation.it: No, attraverso qualsiasi cosa umida. Sangue, saliva, qualsiasi mucosa. Quindi se tocchi il loro sangue, non è un problema.

translation.en: But if you get their blood on you... ...and it gets into a cut, into your mouth, eyes...

translation.en: People get shots in their stomach.
translation.it: Ma la gente si fa il vaccino.

translation.en: Once symptoms show, rabies is 100 percent fatal.
translation.it: Una volta che si manifestano i sintomi, la rabbia è letale al 100 percento.

translation.en: -Where are you going? Where? -I'm going up to my apartment.
translation.it: - Dove sta andando? Dove? - Nel mio appartamento.

translation.en: -Why can't I go? -We gonna do this all night?

translation.en: Oh, yeah, because it's really safe down here.

translation.en: It seems to me, if this is spreading, maybe we should separate...

translation.en: ...instead of sitting here in a big group.
I have a God-given right to protect myself as I see fit, so you know what?
translation.it: Ho il diritto di proteggere me stesso come meglio credo, quindi...
- Me ne andrò di sopra-- - Stia indietro.

translation.en: I'm gonna go and I'm gonna barricade the shit out of it.

We wanna see if there's anything on the news about this.

translation.en: We still use rabbit ears on our TV.
We're going with you. Wait, wait, wait, we're going with you.

translation.en: It's just up here to the right.

translation.it: Oh, mio Dio. Oh, mio Dio.

translation.en: We can't just open the door. We need something to hold the dog back with.

translation.en: Turn it off, Scott. Turn it off.

translation.it: Oh, mi sono dimenticato una cosa.

translation.en: -Shouldn't we shut the door? -Close the door.
translation.it: - Non dovremmo chiudere la porta? - Chiudi la porta.
- Okay. - Ho lasciato la musica accesa.

translation.en: It usually takes a couple of seconds to....
translation.it: Di solito ci mette qualche secondo per...

translation.en: No, I know what I'm doing.

translation.it: - No, io-- - Sì, lo so, va bene?
- ...siamo alla terza ora del servizio. - Ecco.

translation.en: Tell us why the CDC is entering the building.
translation.it: Ci dica perché il CCM sta entrando nel palazzo.
Per precauzione. Abbiamo fatto evacuare tutti.

translation.en: What the fuck is going on here?

translation.it: - Cosa è successo? - Siamo senza corrente.

translation.en: Sadie, stay with me. Sadie, come here.
translation.it: Sadie, resta con me. Sadie, vieni qua.

translation.en: Stay with me. It cannot be.
translation.it: Resta con me. Non può essere.

translation.en: -Stay with me. -You gotta close that door.
translation.it: - Resta con me. - Chiudi quella porta.

translation.en: Angela, you have blood all over your shirt.
translation.it: Angela, hai la maglietta coperta di sangue.

translation.en: I mean, I just killed something with my camera...

translation.en: -I'm with you, you're with me, okay? -Okay, okay, okay, we're here.
translation.it: Sono qui con te e tu sei qui con me, okay? Okay, okay, okay, siamo qui.

translation.en: We get out of here as fast as we fucking can, you hear me?
